SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if player ~= nil then local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:May() filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetPlayer( player ) player:SetTargetCount( 2 ) for i=0,2-1 do player:SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CARD" ) end player:ChooseTargetsWithFlags( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(1), QUERY_FLAG_CAN_BE_FINISHED_EARLY_CANCEL_EDITION + QUERY_FLAG_CAN_BE_FINISHED_EARLY_FOR_AI_AS_WELL ) end

for i = 0,1 do local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_NthCardPtr(i) local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if (target~= nil and player ~= nil) then target:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_LIBRARY ) target:PutInLibrary( -1 ) end end
local player = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if (player ~= nil) then player:ShuffleLibrary() end
